snippet: The Blank Sound Donut speakerphone by iRiver, a South Korean electronics company, has a sleek, modern look and offers rich, full sound for music playback.
abstract: The Blank Sound Donut speakerphone by iRiver, a South Korean electronics company, has a sleek, modern look and offers rich, full sound for music playback.

headline.main: A Doughnut With Sweet Sound (Sprinkles Not Included)
headline.print_headline: A Doughnut With Sweet Sound (Sprinkles Not Included)
